snippet.title: Liftoff: Drone Racing - Release Trailer | PS4
snippet.description:
Liftoff: Drone Racing is out NOW! This fast-paced drone racing simulation challenges you to start a from backyard to pro track drone racing pilot career, either solo in the single player or together with others in the online multiplayer mode.

Race against bots and in time races in single player mode, or play through the single player career mode, which starts back in 2015 at the very beginning of the young fascination of drone racing, and which will guide you through its history. Or you can challenge your friends to gripping races in the multiplayer mode for up to 6 players. 

On the game’s workbench you can customize your drone with over 100 different drone parts by more than 13 originally licensed brands such as Rotor Riot, Armattan and Xhover.

With the drone of your dreams at your command you can discover 12 different maps with several tracks each. 

Discover the whole world of drone racing on your PlayStation 4 and make it to the top to become the world’s best drone pilot!
